long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A typical flow requires the customer success team to copy emails from different pages and search for the same in the SnackMagic admin application. Likewise for user ids and order numbers.

This extension will allow user to simply select the email / user id / order number and navigate to the required page quickly via the context menu options.

The basic functionality simply involves passing the selected value as argument in the url corresponding to the selected option from the context menu. The target URL is opened as a new tab in chrome.
